% send these commands manually via Serial Monitor to initialise and set some standard parameters

10011100 00000010 00000000
10010111 00000101 00001000
10010111 00000110 00100000
10010111 00000111 10000000
10010111 00001000 00001010
10010111 00001001 00000000
10010111 00000000 00000001
10010111 00000001 00000010
